  • Has Security Headers

Recommendations

  1. Implement Content Security Policy (CSP) with strict directives
  2. Use context-aware output encoding for all user input
  3. Implement proper input validation using whitelists
  4. Regularly update and patch all frameworks and libraries
  5. Conduct regular security testing and code reviews
  6. Implement Web Application Firewall (WAF) rules for XSS protection
